subject: Atlantic Yards (Brooklyn)
lead_paragraph: After six years, the developer Bruce C. Ratner’s planned Atlantic Yards project in Brooklyn, which includes an 18,000-seat arena for the Nets, is showing big signs of moving forward.
snippet: After six years, the developer Bruce C. Ratner’s planned Atlantic Yards project in Brooklyn, which includes an 18,000-seat arena for the Nets, is showing big signs of moving forward.
